prompt: Photorealistic wide-angle shot of a diverse collection of antique medicine bottles (aqua, amber, clear, cobalt blue glass) neatly arranged on a rustic, weathered wooden shelf. Varying shapes (oval, rectangular, cylindrical with narrow necks) and sizes are visible. Soft, natural window light illuminates the scene from the side, highlighting the glass textures and subtle color variations. Shallow depth of field blurs the background slightly. Professional informative style. --ar 16:9 --style raw

prompt: Macro photograph focusing on the base of an antique hand-blown medicine bottle, clearly showing an irregular pontil scar and characteristic bubbles trapped within the light aqua glass. The bottle rests on a simple, dark surface. Dramatic side lighting emphasizes the texture, imperfections, and subtle whittle marks indicative of early manufacturing techniques. Extremely shallow depth of field. Professional, detailed identification focus. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-medicine-bottles-identification-image-2.png

prompt: Close-up, eye-level shot centered on an antique amber glass bitters bottle featuring intricate, sharp embossing ('Dr. Kilmer's Swamp Root Kidney Liver & Bladder Cure'). Soft, diffused studio lighting highlights the raised lettering and the texture of the aged glass. The bottle is positioned against a neutral, slightly textured background. Focus is sharp on the embossing, with the rest of the bottle gently falling out of focus. Photorealistic, high detail. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-medicine-bottles-identification-image-3.png

prompt: Over-the-shoulder perspective shot showing gloved hands carefully examining the lip and neck finish of a small antique medicine bottle using a vintage-style brass magnifying glass. The scene is set on a historian's wooden desk, with calipers and reference books subtly blurred in the background. Warm, focused task lighting illuminates the bottle and hands. Emphasis on the act of identification and close inspection. Photorealistic. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-medicine-bottles-identification-image-4.png

prompt: Atmospheric wide shot of several rows of antique medicine bottles displayed on dusty, dark wooden apothecary shelves.
